Text:
great great quality
V : 10
A : 10
just great!

great video, but very low audio volume.
is there any chance that it is my computers problem?
anyone else experiencing the same problem?

Recently read about people having this problem with DVD:s and someone said that it has to do with the wide dynamic range of the AC3-codec, and that this can be mitigated using volume normalization. This is AC3 (at least according to mplayer), and I had the same problem with it. I have since stared using volnorm and checked this file now and it sounded much better, so this should solve it.

- af volnorm=1:0.2 (cli)

af = volnorm=1:0.2 (config file)

This is for mplayer, users of other players may help themselves.
